DOC.brief_summary: Compare the clinical performance of the Xpert® HIV-1 VL to another FDA approved HIV-1 RNA quantitative assay using frozen and fresh specimens from known HIV-1 positive individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the Xpert® HIV-1 VL
DOC.criteria: HIV1 seropositive adults using an FDA approved method At least 18 years of age or older Informed consent, if applicable Subject is less than 18 years of age Previously enrolled in this study Samples not collected according to the procedure
